dashboard-process-template:
<template name="PID-Team:!*!: Project (Team)" ID="PID/TeamRoot" defineRollup="no" dataFile="PID/team_root_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/TeamNode{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}" > This node cannot be directly instantiated by the user. They must instead instantiate a team project stub, and run the setup wizard to create an instance of this template.
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
<template name="PID-Team:!*!:Subsystem" ID="PID/TeamNode" defineRollup="no" dataFile="PID/team_node_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/TeamNode{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
<template name="PID-Team:!*!:Task" ID="PID/TeamTask" defineRollup="no" XdefectLog="false" dataFile="PID/team_task_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/TeamTask{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask" >
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!: Project" ID="PID/IndivRoot" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_root_dataFile.txt" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}" > This node cannot be directly instantiated by the user. They must instead use the team setup wizard to join a team project.
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> Project Quality Summary"/ --> Process Script"/ -->
* * * * <template * name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Subtask" * ID="PID/IndivFullNode" * * usesRollup="PID" * * defineRollup="no" * * defectLog="true" * dataFile="PID/indiv_full_dataFile.txt" * size="New & Changed LOC" * constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode" * > * * <html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" * title=" Project Plan Summary"/> * Project Quality Summary"/ --> * <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" * title=" Process Script"/> * * * * * <html ID="Phase_script" * title=" Script" * href="PID/Phase_script.htm"/> * * <phase name="Sub_tasks /" imaginary="true"/> * <phase name="" * type="" * * size="" * * constraints="ED{}" * htmlID="Phase_script"/> * * * * *
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Subtask" ID="PID/IndivFullNode"
usesRollup="PID"
defineRollup="no"
defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_full_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<html ID="Phase_script" title=" Script" href="PID/Phase_script.htm"/>
<phase name="" type=""
size=""
constraints="ED{}" GTACS_disabled_htmlID="Phase_script"/>
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Simple Subtask" ID="PID/IndivEmptyNode" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_empty_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> Project Quality Summary"/ --> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<template name="PID-Indiv:!*!:Subsystem" ID="PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" defineRollup="no" defectLog="true" dataFile="PID/indiv_empty_dataFile.txt" size="New & Changed LOC" constraints="ME{PID/IndivFullNode{PID/IndivEmptyNode{PID/Rollup{PID/PHASE/Phase}" > We alter the constraints to make this node immovable and uneditable. We also change the 'required parent' list to '}', which makes it impossible for users to instantiate this node into their hierarchy manually.
<html ID="sump" href="PID/plan_summary.shtm" title=" Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="top" href="PID/script.htm" title=" Process Script"/>
<template name="PID-phase:!*!:" ID="PID/PHASE/Phase" dataFile="none" href="PID/Phase_script.htm" constraints="ED{}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" />
<phase name="" type=""
size=""
imaginary="true"/>
<template name="PID-rollup:!*!:Rollup Data" ID="PID/Rollup" dataFile="PID/rollup_dataFile.txt" defineRollup="no" constraints="{}PID/TeamRoot}PID/TeamNode}PID/TeamTask}PID/IndivRoot}PID/IndivFullNode}PID/IndivEmptyNode}PID/IndivReadOnlyNode" >
<html ID="sump" href="PID/rollup_plan_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Plan Summary"/> <html ID="sumq" href="PID/rollup_quality_summary.shtm" title=" Rollup Project Quality Summary"/> <html ID="charts" href="PID/charts.shtm" title=" Analysis Charts"/>
